description: The most popular beverage in the Mojave, Sunset Sasparilla is surprisingly healthy, and free of radiation!

name: Vim! Pop
description: A popular soft drink from Maine, originally sold as a health tonic. Made using Maine's pure spring water and minimal flavoring ingredients, its a healthy alternative to rival sodas.

name: Vim! Refresh
description: A popular soft drink from Maine, originally sold as a health tonic. Made using Maine's pure spring water and minimal flavoring ingredients, its a healthy alternative to rival sodas. Vim! Refresh is a delicious apple flavor that seems to help energize the consumer.

name: Vim! Quartz
description: A popular soft drink from Maine, originally sold as a health tonic. Made using Maine's pure spring water and minimal flavoring ingredients, its a healthy alternative to rival sodas. Vim! Quartz is a delicious bubblegum flavor. The Nuka-Cola corporation actually sued Vim! over use of the same name, and Vim! Quartz was set to be taken off store shelves shortly after the apocalypse happened.

name: Vim! Captain's Blend
description: A popular soft drink from Maine, originally sold as a health tonic. Made using Maine's pure spring water and minimal flavoring ingredients, its a healthy alternative to rival sodas. The Captain's Blend was in the very early test-market stages before the apocalypse bathed the world in hell itself, but testers claimed the flavor was oddly fishy.
